item.title: CVE-2020-1442|2024-08-04T06:39:09.664Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20office%20online%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when an Office Web Apps server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted request, aka 'Office Web Apps XSS Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2021-34451|2024-08-04T00:12:50.170Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20office%20online%20server
